name: Hyppies.com
description: At Hyppies, we're more than just a recruitment company; we're a movement. Inspired by the ethos of hypergrowth and high potential, we're dedicated to matching the most talented individuals with the most ambitious tech companies. Our name, Hyppies, is a nod to the revolutionary spirit of the hippie movement, reflecting our commitment to challenging the conventional approach to tech recruitment. We envision a world where the right talent meets the right opportunity, creating a synergy that fuels innovation and growth in the tech sector. We believe in the power of people and their potential to transform industries, and we're here to make those connections happen.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: HR Tech and Services for the Future of work
ShortDescription: At Hyppies, we're more than just a recruitment company; we're a movement. Inspired by the ethos of hypergrowth and high potential, we're dedicated to matching the most talented individuals with the most ambitious tech companies.

Highlights.name: Finding the Perfect Cultural Fit with Technology
Highlights.description: Hyppies uses technology to find the right cultural fit for you [1]. This means that they go beyond just your skills and experience to find a job that is a good fit for your personality and work style. This can be important for ensuring that you are happy and successful in your new role.

Highlights.name: Job Opportunities Across Asia and Beyond
Highlights.description: Hyppies offers job opportunities all over Asia and beyond [1]. This means that you are not limited to just jobs in your local area. You can search for jobs in different countries and cities, which can be a great opportunity to experience a new culture and lifestyle.

Highlights.name: Building Strong Client and Candidate Relationships
Highlights.description: Hyppies cares about their client and candidate relationships [1]. This means that they are committed to providing a positive experience for both businesses and job seekers. They take the time to understand your needs and goals, and they work hard to find the perfect match.

enhanced_description: Hyppies.com is a recruitment company specializing in matching high-potential talent with ambitious tech companies, particularly those in hypergrowth phases or requiring project-based staffing. They aim to challenge conventional tech recruitment by leveraging technology to focus on cultural fit, not just skills. Hyppies offers comprehensive services including Recruitment & Engagement, Consulting & Contracting. They provide job opportunities across Asia and beyond, emphasizing strong client and candidate relationships to ensure successful placements that fuel innovation and growth in the tech sector.
key_use_cases: Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
competitive_advantages: Specialized focus on hypergrowth and high-potential tech companies
Leverages technology for cultural fit assessment
Extensive job opportunities across Asia and beyond
Strong emphasis on client and candidate relationship building
roi_benefits: Fuels innovation and growth in the tech sector
Improved talent retention through cultural fit
Access to a wider pool of global talent (especially Asia)
